GSD.product_version: versions from v4.4 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
scsi: hpsa: Fix possible memory leak in hpsa_add_sas_device()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit ac5cfe8bbbf91b99838e1996faa661295e59830d, it was introduced in version v4.4 by commit d04e62b9d63a7498735761dc40eaed88b7fd9d80. For more details please see the references link.
